name: @keienla/functional
description: Just a functional library in TypeScript to do Functional Programming

scripts.build: if exist dist (rmdir dist /q /s && tsc --build) else (tsc --build)
scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && npm run buildandpublish
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && npm run buildandpublish
scripts.publish:major: npm version major && npm run buildandpublish
